selections.name: Odin Normandy
selections.reason: Won over track and trip in key reference race Jan 9; meets rival Coronado on same weight terms, should confirm form.

selections.name: Coronado
selections.reason: Finished 3rd to top pick last time out; consistent performer at this level and logical main danger.

selections.name: Keen Approach
selections.reason: Not far beaten in 6th in the same key race; capable of hitting the board with a cleaner trip.

selections.name: John Wick
selections.reason: Distance specialist with stamina in pedigree; likely to be running on late.

danger_horse.name: Coronado
danger_horse.reason: Consistent placer who finished close to the top pick recently.

selections.name: Greymara
selections.reason: Won last start over this track and distance; remains in good form and drawn well.

selections.name: Octane
selections.reason: Solid 2nd last time out at Chantilly; consistent type who fits well in this handicap.

selections.name: Kensilver
selections.reason: Reliable sort with a 3rd place finish Dec 30; rarely runs a bad race.

selections.name: Betise
selections.reason: Runner-up last time out; has the speed to be competitive here.

danger_horse.name: Octane
danger_horse.reason: Recent form suggests he is ready to win.

selections.name: Ram Sea
selections.reason: Finished 2nd to Misterwinner last out but meets that rival with a significant 7lb weight swing in favor; prime candidate to reverse form.

selections.name: Misterwinner
selections.reason: Won the key reference race comfortably, but carries top weight (141lbs) today which makes the repeat harder.

selections.name: Potter Nicoliere
selections.reason: Finished 3rd in the key race carrying light weight; remains dangerous at the bottom of the handicap.

selections.name: Rejaitt
selections.reason: Winner last time out; improving filly but faces tougher company here.

danger_horse.name: Misterwinner
danger_horse.reason: The form horse, though weight penalty is significant.

selections.name: Tasteful
selections.reason: Finished 2nd to Renad by a head last time giving weight; now meets Renad with a 6lb weight swing advantage. Strong bet.

selections.name: Renad
selections.reason: Won the key race Jan 2; penalized in weights but clearly likes the surface.

selections.name: Quemazal
selections.reason: Won maiden last out at Pornichet; steps up to handicap company in good form.

selections.name: Anolante
selections.reason: Won claiming/handicap Jan 9; quick turnaround suggests fitness.

selections.name: Melusine Du Houley
selections.reason: Runner-up on debut in November; sets the standard on established form.

selections.name: Infrarouge
selections.reason: Newcomer from top connections (Wertheimer/Ferland); watch betting market closely.

selections.name: Vathana
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last time out; consistent enough to hit the board.

selections.name: Reve Sur Le Nil
selections.reason: Experience edge and Pasquier takes the ride; can improve.

danger_horse.name: Infrarouge
danger_horse.reason: Pedigree and connections suggest a strong debut.

selections.name: Kalkara
selections.reason: Huge class drop from G3 company; 5th in Prix du Bois last year. If fit off layoff, wins easily.

selections.name: Alhaeba
selections.reason: Finished 2nd on Jan 8; race-fit and the logical alternative if the favorite needs the run.

selections.name: Taradif
selections.reason: Represents top stable (Graffard); likely to improve significantly.

selections.name: Hello Carel
selections.reason: 4th last time out; solid place contender.

danger_horse.name: Alhaeba
danger_horse.reason: Recent fitness edge over the top pick.

selections.name: Ever Kate
selections.reason: Consistent form in this grade; 3/1 favorite looks justified in a weak field.

selections.name: Lattaash
selections.reason: Finished 5th recently; Demuro booking is a positive sign.

selections.name: Exact
selections.reason: Dropping in class; capable of better at this level.

selections.name: Kelly Key
selections.reason: Distance suits and draws well.

selections.name: Zangar
selections.reason: Consistent maiden with multiple 2nd place finishes; form stands out above the rest.

selections.name: Gold And Dream
selections.reason: 4th last time out; showing steady improvement.

selections.name: Miss Yorkshire
selections.reason: Recent 4th place finish puts her in the mix for minors.

selections.name: Regalienne
selections.reason: Returning from layoff with Soumillon aboard; watch for market moves.
